meanings.sent1: The magical spell cast by the wizard immortalizes the brave knight forever.
meanings.sent2: The artist immortalizes their love for nature in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent3: The time-traveling robot accidentally immortalizes a dinosaur in a photograph.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song immortalizes the emotions of the singer in every note.
meanings.sent5: The ancient monument immortalizes the glory of a long-gone civilization.

meanings.definition: To preserve in memory or history.
meanings.sent1: The historian immortalizes the hero's deeds in their books for future generations.
meanings.sent2: A photograph immortalizes a moment that would otherwise fade away with time.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tries to immortalize its acorn stash on a hidden camera.
meanings.sent4: The storyteller immortalizes the wisdom of the elders in their tales passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The inscription on the monument immortalizes the names of those who fought for freedom.
